p: The viruses can be transmitted from infectious mosquitoes to susceptible humans, and from infectious humans to susceptible mosquitoes through blood meals. We formulate the viral transmission in terms of the rate at which infectious mosquitoes or infectious humans infect others, rather than the traditional formulation in terms of the rate at which the susceptible individuals are being infected as in [ 23]. The notation in this infectious viewpoint emphasizes that the infectious population drive the epidemic and clarifies the derivation for effective reproduction number.
